# NavigationBarItem.TitleDisplayMode

**Enumeration**

A style for displaying the title of a navigation bar.

## Declaration

```swift
enum TitleDisplayMode
```

## Overview

Use one of these values with the [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/View/navigationBarTitleDisplayMode(_:)] view modifier to configure the title of a navigation bar.

## Getting title display modes

- **NavigationBarItem.TitleDisplayMode.automatic**: Inherit the display mode from the previous navigation item.
- **NavigationBarItem.TitleDisplayMode.inline**: Display the title within the standard bounds of the navigation bar.
- **NavigationBarItem.TitleDisplayMode.large**: Display a large title within an expanded navigation bar.

## Conforms To

- Copyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
